name: Super Pet Capture
description:
Also play here:https://liluo.io/simering_studios/super-pet-capture 

!WARNINGGGGGG! Must reload site due to a glitch after every round :(

Controls: Use mouse to move

 the vacumm up and down. Click to

 vacuum the pets to safty.

Mobile Controls: Tap once to move

 the vacuum to the location of your finger, tap 

again to vacuum pets to safty.

Game: All the pets are running

striaght into lava! It's up to you to 

save them! Use the vacuum

(Pet Catcher 2000)to bring them to 

safty! Once 3 mins is up you can

choose to submit your score!
